name: Anubis
description: He helps to decied people's fate in the afterlife with help of Scale of Justice.

name: Wepwawet
description: A scout who reports about invaders. Brother to Anubis.

name: Sekhmet
description: A fiercy lioness warrior. Daughter of Ra.

name: Seth
description: The lord of the desert. Father to Anubis and Wepwawet.

name: Thoth
description: In training to become worthy the title god of wisdom. Currently studying under a non-god animal called Zosar.

name: Taweret
description: God of Childbirth and one of the three protectors of the Nile.

name: Khnum
description: God of the Source of the Nile. Also one of the three protectors of the Nile.

name: Sobek
description: War Deity of the Nile. Also one of the three protectors of the Nile.

name: Nekhbet
description: A deity who is sister to the god Wadjet.

name: Wadjet
description: A deity who is sister to the god Nekhbet.

name: Bastet
description: A deity who is trying to bring peace in Egypt. Daughter to Ra, sister to Hathor, Sekhmet and Maat. Half-sister to Tefnut.

name: Hathor
description: A deity who is trying to bring peace in Egypt. Daughter to Ra, sister to Hathor, Sekhmet and Maat. Half-sister to Tefnut.
